user.title: Create a Lightener device
user.description: Please give a name to the Lightener device being created

data_description.name: The goal is making it obvious which group of lights is controlled by this device. Usually it's an area/room name, like "Living Room" but it can be anything

data.controlled_entities: Select the light entities to be controlled by this Lightener device

data_description.brightness: A list mapping the brightness of this light when the Lightener reaches certain brightness levels. Each line has the format (Lightner brightness %): (Controlled light brightness %). For example, "60:100" specifies that when the Lightener reaches 60% of brightness "{light_name}" will reach 100%

error.invalid_brightness: Invalid brightness mapping configuration "{error_entry}". Each line must have the format "(number from 1 to 100): (number from 0 to 100)". For example "40: 100"
